content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Ah, the pleasure is all mine. So, you're interested in renting my humble abode? Well then, let's discuss the terms. I'm sure we can come to an agreement that will benefit both of us. What's your proposed monthly rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'll give you a number. Let's say it's 800 Euro.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Ah, 800 Euros. Now that's what I'm talkin' about! I'd be more than happy to rent this apartment to you for that sum. It's a fair price, don't you think? I mean, it's only 25 square meters, but it's in a prime location, and it's fully furnished. And let's not forget about the quality of the construction. It's solid as a rock, I assure you. So, are we settling on 800 Euros a month? I agree to the price of 800 Euros.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, I'll give you 700 Euros.

So, I'm willing to rent this apartment for 700 Euros a month.

I agree to the price of 700 Euros.

TERMINATE.

I'll take my leave.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Ah, well, well, well. If that's the case, then I must apologize, but I can't accept your offer of 700 Euros a month. It's just not enough for me to consider renting out this apartment to you. I mean, come on, it's only 25 square meters, and I'm sure you can find something else that suits your needs better. And besides, I'm sure there are plenty of other landlords out there who are willing to rent their apartments for a higher price. So, I'm afraid I must terminate our negotiations. I hope you understand. Thank you for coming to see the apartment, and I wish you the best of luck in your search.
name: Heinrich Heine
